hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the soul of Volvagia#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #5# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #7# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the easiest way to kill Peahats is using Din's Fire while they're grounded.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Water Temple Main Room L2 Pot 2

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #Morpha#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Eyeball Frog# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Zora Scale#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a medium-sized fish (child)#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #generic grotto#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #time#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the soul of Volvagia#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Green Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a medium-sized fish (child)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a medium-sized fish (child)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs# including an Upgrade one.
